Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Provides respondents the option to repay a court ordered refund in installments of no more than five years
Summary: Provides respondents the option to repay a court ordered refund in installments of no more than five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing respondents the option to repay a court ordered refund in installments of no more than five years
